lender.name: Ryan

lender.occupational_info: I reserve golf tee times and tournaments for people looking to play golf in San Diego, Palm Springs, Phoenix, and Las Vegas.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a chance for a better life.

lender.name: Jamey
lender.loan_because: my boyfriend wants me to be more consciences of globalization, international poverty, finance(both mine and in general) and the economy
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Tampa

lender.name: Innes and Finn

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at success.
lender.occupational_info: I work in drug and medical research. I am striving to produce cheap, efficient medications to reach the globe.

lender.name: Sherry and Niko
lender.loan_because: I care about people in less fortunate circumstance than myself and I want to help them improve their lives. Everyone can use a little help at particular points in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and I buy houses and improve them, and then rent them to others. I also work with plants and design gardens.

lender.name: James

lender.occupational_info: I do environmental contracting. Basically I clean up soil and groundwater that has been polluted from manufacturing and other necessary processes.

lender.name: Selby and Felix
lender.loan_because: God has blessed myself and my bother and we want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We are students at a Christian school.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I didn't get to where I am on my own.
lender.occupational_info: Respond to fires and medical emergencies

lender.name: Inna
lender.loan_because: It's important to remember, despite the fact that I am currently unemployed, that I have so much more than many people out there. I want to do my part to share my good fortune at living in such a prosperous country.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Kiva made it easy to be part of the solution to poverty. Thank you for all your hard work.

lender.name: Lexy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in others livesl

lender.name: Shona
lender.whereabouts: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft & Wizardry Iowa

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: it's good to give back

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: I believe in the American Dream, regardless of where you live.
lender.occupational_info: I fix things.

lender.name: William & Sylvia
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with money to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an architect designing community buildings such as libraries and community centers.

lender.name: Anand
lender.loan_because: Very Angry People
lender.occupational_info: Very Angry People

lender.name: Pay it forward.
lender.loan_because: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin somewhere.. In this life we can not do great things. We can only do small things with great love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: So many people can rebuild their lives with just such a small amount from us. It means the world to them and it feels good to know that we are helping people building their economic path.

lender.name: OVARPT
lender.loan_because: I want....
lender.occupational_info: a great job...

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others......
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at Hospice helping people in the final stages of their lives.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: It is so fantastic to see people helping themselves improve their life situation. There have been times in the past when I would have appreciated a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Teacher. Currently I work mostly in a Boys' Juvenile Justice Centre and a behaviour Management School. Over the years I have taught pre-school as well as Primary School and Secondary School.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help women in the countries that gave me my children
lender.occupational_info: I work in the women's office of a government agency that helps small businesses start and grow successfully

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It closes the gaps in the world. It helps to unite everyone in the act of charity and giving without knowing their last names.

lender.name: Aleeda
lender.loan_because: Women hold up half the sky. (Chinese saying)

lender.name: Handicraft Nepal
lender.occupational_info: We are committed to the production, collection and the supplying of quality Nepalese handicraft Wholesale to worldwide handicraft dealers who buy Nepalese handicraft. We offer one of the largest Nepalese handicraft wholesale ranges, including wholesale scarf, clothing, Bhutanese incense , Tibetan Incense ,flora natural Incense, Lokta paper, paper mask, wooden Handicraft, felted product, jewelry, bags, Tibetan Home decoration goods, and handicrafts from Nepal. Thank you

lender.name: Brett Dobbs
lender.loan_because: people have done the same for me!
lender.occupational_info: I served as a Kiva Fellow in with K-MET in Kisumu, Kenya and am currently in law school.

lender.name: V J
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and it keeps my life in perspective.
lender.occupational_info: I design and write application programs. I do website design. I have an online giftshop and a mystery review site. In my spare time I write.

lender.loan_because: we live in a network of mutuality
lender.occupational_info: I make films.

lender.name: max and kate scott
lender.loan_because: we both were born in Cambodia. We now live in the US with our adoptive parents. This is our way to give back to those who gave so much to us, life, heritage, a sense of being a world citizen.
lender.occupational_info: we are kids, that is our main job !!! we are 8 and 11 years old

lender.name: POSC 340_Fall 2008
lender.loan_because: we're studying poverty and wanted to participate directly in a micro-credit program.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can help make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm pretty much the coolest person in the world! :)

lender.name: Lam
lender.loan_because: it provides opportunities for those who will make it happen. Everyone deserves a chance at their dream.
lender.occupational_info: Development work provides the basis for others who happen to be born in different situations.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: The highest form of charity is giving a loan so that someone can become established in business and won't need charity in future.
lender.occupational_info: I study cancer cells and look for a cure.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I have a start up business and understand the financial challenges it takes to grow it.. I believe everyone should be afforded the opportunity to grow and better themselves, their families and communities because this truly is the only way we will become a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a jewelery buyer for retail stores. I have also started my own business that focuses on women's athletic and surf apparel.

lender.name: Clementine
lender.loan_because: I want to help women overcome poverty in Congo DRC and throughout Africa. With each loan, I know I am making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Grant writing, Fundraising, Research, Marketing, Prospect Research

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I believe that God has called us to love and support one another. Being an entrepreneur myself, I know how hard that can be sometimes. I want to help and encourage other entrepreneurs to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy helping people reach their goals and dreams to live a better life. I show people how to become and live debt free, how to save money and protect their income and assets (things they own). My products are life insurance, personal and home loans and debt elimination plans.

lender.name: Mitch
lender.occupational_info: I teach Economics in a High School in Clarksville, Tennessee.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.occupational_info: I founded and still serve as publisher of a magazine for women.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: God loves us and we must love one another!
lender.occupational_info: I build, repair and restore jewelry - primarily Native American designs.

lender.name: vandana
lender.loan_because: We want to start family tradition to give back on our birthday.

lender.name: Alan
lender.occupation: I do a lot of things at Google
lender.loan_because: I want to see intelligent and hardworking people be successful.

lender.name: Daryoosh
lender.occupation: The director of zeros and ones
lender.loan_because: I can feel good about giving without having to give anything.

lender.name: Jim and Mara
lender.loan_because: Our belief is that person to person lending can inspire both sides of the loan to achieve success! To endorse this we make loans.
lender.occupational_info: We operate a consulting firm serving the needs of large and small companies to secure their people, information, communications sytems and assets world wide

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: It is something useful I can do to help.
lender.occupational_info: Mom of two teenage boys, married to a very good man.

lender.name: Mary Beth
lender.loan_because: I have had difficult times during my life and I am very grateful to those who helped me. I would like to be of help to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a construction company. I take care of everything that has to do with money; paychecks, bills, banking, and making sure we get paid for our work.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected - and I want to share the blessings God has given me. I want others around the world, especially women, to achieve their goals and make their dreams come true, whether their hope is to be financially independent, to provide for their families, to educate themselves or their children, to obtain proper medical care, or to help others in their own communities. Together, we can do it!

lender.name: jovial_cynic
lender.loan_because: i can. i've been blessed with an abundance of resources, and want to pass that blessing on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make sure that my company insures good risks, and also help people get the kind of coverage they need.

lender.name: FUMC COPPELL TX MISSIONS
lender.loan_because:
We loan to provide HOPE to our neighbors around the globe.
Microfinance is one of our Missions.
lender.occupational_info: First United Methodist Church Coppell Gathering for Worship, Growing in Grace, Going to Serve

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I know it can be hard to stand on your own two feet sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I film, edit and produce videos for clients, ranging from corporate, promotional, documentary and sometimes music and weddings.

lender.name: Brian & Cindy
lender.loan_because: To make the world a better place!

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe lots of people helping in a small way can make a big difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: Hospital work

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: I met a nice girl in Boulder City, Nevada that is now working with Kiva. I had never heard about it before, but after talking to her I wanted to join up.
lender.occupational_info: Ninja.

lender.name: Edward

lender.loan_because: it's the gift that keeps on giving
lender.occupational_info: I help financially distressed hospitals become profitable again.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with the means to do so, and I wish to help people who are trying to make a living and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired office worker, a widow, and I spend much of my time with my family and my four beautiful grandchildren.

lender.name: Lou& the Girls
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people to be able to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work on projects and help with the people side of change

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by people who are willing to take a chance and follow their dreams. I hope to help people in some small way and let them know anything really is possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work from home. My husband and I have two school age children, and live in a big city near the beach. We live on the west coast of Canada.

lender.name: Umm Abdulrahman
lender.loan_because:
Charity or 'saqadah' is a very important part of my faith. This site enables me to fulfil this for me.
At the moment i am biased towards women who are trying their best to earn enough to provide for their families - i've been there; in the West you provide for the ones around you - then the ones left 'at home'..
lender.occupational_info: I work to help support my family - and although I dont earn a great deal; i remain conscious of the fact that there are people out there who dont have the luxuries that I do: a roof over my head; food in my mouth; running water and electricity. Me sacrificing a 'little amount' here can make a huge difference to someone else out there..

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think it is important that a person be given the opportunity to excel. If I my contribution can make a difference to someone then everyone will benefit.
lender.occupational_info: Financial Management

lender.name: Lea Thomsen
lender.loan_because: I must. It is so hard to choose who you should lend money to, but I have a tendency to choose women. I guess it is a kind of sister solidarity. I have the highest respect for anyone trying to run their own business and adding having to run a home too, only makes it more impressive. You go girls!
lender.occupational_info: I manage web development tasks. I see them through and make sure nothing is missed. My own contribution to the projects are usually usability-focused.

lender.name: Nuno
lender.loan_because: Because I can...

lender.occupational_info: I make cartoons. I do not draw myself, but help artists get their ideas made so children around the world may see them.

lender.name: Eva

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lender.name: Stanley
lender.loan_because: I think everyone that is willing to work deserves an opportunity to better themselves. I also wish that there could be money loaned for education.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: I am prosperous and I want to help others to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I do lots of different things because I like variety. I really enjoy teaching, researching, writing and being creative. I love genealogy, early music and good health. And cats ...

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I know that as a resident of the United States, even the small amount of money I make could mean a big difference to someone else. As a woman, I am proud to lend to other women, and I always lend to those whose stories touch my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to work in museums, hoping that my work can create more opportunities for equality and acceptance.

lender.name: Margaret

lender.loan_because: I always wanted to donate a small part of my income to someone in need.. and Kiva works much better for me as i can give more loans with the money being paid back.... My money being used again and again to improve someone's life!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in the world goal of eliminating extreme poverty. I think the kiva model is extremely promising, and want to help with its success.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations define goals and become more effective at achieving them.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I have been very Blessed and wanted to find a way to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and a wife, and I have two beautiful daughters

lender.name: Anna
lender.occupational_info: I used to work in an office and help other biologists to protect rare species but I'm taking time off to take care of my son

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: My father is a lifelong entrepreneur and I want to help fuel the entrepreneurial spirit of those around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Football.

lender.name: Massimiliano
lender.loan_because: I feel that is good a way to invest my money rather than make Wall street speculator rich...

lender.name: RupaMagic
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, and yes, it makes me feel good
lender.occupational_info:
I love traveling and have seen first hand the radical difference between western excess and third world poverty. I am thrilled that someone has figured out a way for us "little people" who may have only a few extra bucks in our pockets to help in a direct and tangible way.
I work as a chef in a holistic healing center in the Redwoods of northern California. Cooking is one of my great passions and I feel so blessed that I am able to do what I love for a living.

lender.name: Marvin & Emma
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Educate people on the benefits of solar energy.

lender.name: Luzy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone striving for success in need of some resources.
lender.occupational_info: I am a theatrical actress. I like to perform powerful dramatic performances. I have performed at the Yale School of Drama in 2001. I also like to model. I enjoy public service and community service.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I can. I get to feel good by doing good.

lender.name: Gautam
lender.loan_because: I believe in the tremendous benefits of microfinancing in the fight against poverty. This is a way of truly empowering small entreprenuers, and eventually throwing them in the ranks of the middle class.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: Life is kharmic

lender.name: Rebecca Dunsdon
lender.loan_because: I would like to see a world where everyone can access adequate resources to lead fulfilling lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a migrant centre that provides support to newly arrived migrants and refugees. Currently, I work as a refugee settlement worker, helping individuals and families from refugee backgrounds to settle successfully in Australia. I also work as a community development worker with minority ethnic groups from the Chin state of Burma and the Sudanese and Afghan communities in Melbourne to assess their needs and build their capacity to achieve their goals.

lender.name: John Arundel
lender.loan_because: It's fun!

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I think that micro-finance may be the best way to improve the economy and living conditions for the average person in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for the sandwich chain, Subway. I go around to different Subway restaurants and help the owners improve their businesses.

lender.name: Gustavo Santos
lender.loan_because: I think that we have obligation to help who needs. We do not know the future, and can happen that in the future we also need help. And if everybody helps each others, the world will be better.

lender.name: Eric Jautee
lender.loan_because: "microeconomy" is a clue for fruitful development of poor countries. France, which is a great rich nation, must work with efficiency for the poorer countries.
lender.occupational_info: Professional earth scientist, loving nature with a pantheist mood.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in planning emergency, urban search and rescue and emergency control.

lender.name: Mikko
lender.loan_because: I want to find out if microcredit works and the best way to do that is by participating in it.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I want to see people helped who need help, because Jesus loves a cheerful giver.
lender.occupational_info: Webmaster of orphanage.org.

lender.name: Marie Christine
lender.loan_because: It's normal to help people when we can do it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm secretary

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute for a better world

lender.name: Nils
lender.loan_because: It`s a great ideal to help as this way !
lender.occupational_info: ... plays no real role :-) ...

lender.name: Boitumelo
lender.occupational_info: Dumela borra le boma! Greetings from Botswana, Africa. My name is Boitumelo Pule, and I am a 45 year old single woman living in the small rural village of Machaneng. I have 4 children, the eldest being 25 and the youngest being 14. Education and personal development have always been a priority in our family. My eldest sons have all completed either university or technical schools, while my youngest son recently received eight academic and extra curricular awards at his secondary school. While raising four talented yet charmingly adventurous sons, I made time to run my own small business. For the past few years I have been using my own personal funds to sell second hand clothes to the people in surrounding villages. While the demand for affordable, high quality clothing in a relatively impoverished area such as ours is consistent, the overhead for procuring and vending these items often leaves my profitless. My goal is to expand my business, buy my products in bulk, and service my clients with greater efficiency and quality. The growing social climate in Botswana is one of self sufficiency and creative innovation. I hope my cooperation with the American people will foster a strong and lucrative relationship that will advance both me and my community members. Thank you for your time and support!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I care. This is a little way I can support my sisters and brothers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I'm enrolled at university and study Global Studies with a minor in TESOL

lender.name: Toby
lender.loan_because: Helping people get out of poverty is my obligation

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: They inspire me to be a better person!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom first and foremost; but I'm also a wife and a critical care nurse

lender.name: Sean and Beth
lender.loan_because: We want to help end poverty.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It creates a cycle of giving.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: God is good.

lender.name: Megan and David
lender.loan_because: We want to give back a small portion of what the world community has given to us.
lender.occupational_info: Megan helps people regain their mobility and independence after injury or illness. David develops products that help people in developing countries lead healthier and happier lives.

lender.name: Cal
lender.occupation: Retired from ExxonMobil, Belleville Ont Canada
lender.loan_because: To help others who want to help themselves

lender.name: Kaitlynn
lender.loan_because: I can use extra funds that would otherwise sit for months while helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I study economics and work part time in my dad's law office. I will finish my bachelor's degree in December 2009.

lender.name: CCE Kids for KIVA
lender.loan_because: We want to help others who only need a little help to make their lives better.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should be given a chance to improve their life. Other people have helped me and it is a pleasure to pass on the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I have been involved with starting companies that help improve people's health - like developing ways to treat and cure disease.

lender.name: Edna
lender.loan_because: Mostly because I can. I'm on your side. I believe in sharing the wealth this world has to offer.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently working on-call in a drug rehab center, assisting women withdrawing from drug use.

lender.name: SIFE UNT
lender.loan_because: Alleviating poverty: Give others the chance to make a change for themselves, their communities, and their countries.

lender.name: noelle
lender.loan_because: I love charity! and I love my hevenly father,he would want me to give. I feel saddness when i see the poverty of the world!! i hope you know i love you!! And god does to!! he watches over you!! and i hope you are ok!!! Love you All!!
lender.occupational_info: I do school all day. I am home schooled I love it. I work around the house alot. I am 12 years old . God loves all! So don't forget it!!

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I would like to foster sustainable development and the sense of self-determination that comes from being able to achieve your goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am primarily an educator - I teach Computing Science at a University. My wife and I also run a small independent farm with a guest house.

lender.name: Goran
lender.loan_because: Nice, to be able help!

lender.name: Mehrban
lender.loan_because: All of us can make a difference.

lender.name: Stephen E
lender.occupational_info: I design water and sewer treatment facilities and pipelines.

lender.name: Lamar
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed. Your spirit and your hard work will be rewarded.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small business's. Your hard work will bring you happiness and security.

lender.name: Martyn & Gill
lender.loan_because: God has been very good to us, and it is a privelege to be able to help others
lender.occupational_info: Martyn manages a transport company and Gill has recently retired as an infant teacher.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Studying computers. With a particular interest in making people's lives better, whether that be through a useful program, or by someday creating something like kiva (In terms of usefulness, not a copy or something, ha.)
